titles.title: Safeguarding Our Hospitals' Futures Act of 2008
A bill to require continued application of budget neutrality on a national basis in calculation of the Medicare urban hospital wage floor.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/25/2008--Introduced. Safeguarding Our Hospitals' Futures Act of 2008 - Requires the Secretary of Health and Human Services, in the case of discharges occurring on or after October 1, 2008, to continue to apply budget neutrality on a national basis in the calculation of the urban hospital wage floor for discharges occurring during FY2008 under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act (through a uniform, national adjustment to the area wage index).
